Texts.Chs: ^orange;科技^reset;极其实用，并且可以广泛应用于各种细分场景。比如增加速度，二段跳以及其他许多用法。你可以用^orange;便携式科技控制板^reset;或^orange;科技升级控制台^reset;来配置你的科技。现在就尝试一下你的^orange;便携式科技控制板^reset;！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Techs^reset; are extremely useful, and have quite varied applications to suit almost any niche. Increased speed, double jump, and so many other things. You can change your techs around with a ^orange;Tech Tablet^reset; or a ^orange;Tech Console^reset;. Try your ^orange;Tech Tablet^reset; out now!
